examples: It's amazing how soon you adapt.
Es asombroso lo pronto que te adaptas.
The organisms were forced to adapt in order to survive.
Los organismos se vieron obligados a adaptarse para sobrevivir.
Some animals have a remarkable ability to adapt to changing environments.
Algunos animales tienen una notable capacidad para adaptarse a entornos cambiantes.
A large organization can be slow to adapt to change
Una organización grande puede tardar en adaptarse al cambio
